articles.title: Watering your house plants
articles.text:

species.name: Monstera Deliciosa
species.text: Monstera deliciosa, the Swiss cheese plant, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical forests of southern Mexico, south to Panama. It has been introduced to many tropical areas, and has become a mildly invasive species in Hawaii, Seychelles, Ascension Island and the Society Islands. It is very widely grown in temperate zones as a houseplant. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monstera_deliciosa)

species.title: Ficus Elastica
species.subtitle: The Rubber Plant
species.text: The only plant that actively hates water and sun.

species.title: Doristeina Hildebrandtii
species.subtitle: Dori
species.text: Grabbed this fella from the local nursery 5 years ago. He's thriving!

species.title: Geranium
species.subtitle: Flower McFlowerpants
species.text: These colourful flowers love a little afternoon sun!

species.title: cupressaceae juniperus
species.subtitle: Juniper
species.text: 4 years old, trained with wire for that elegant curve. Has indoor vacations some times.
